      • getDefaultClassLoader

        public static java.lang.ClassLoader getDefaultClassLoader()
        Copy from Spring, 按顺序获取默认ClassLoader 1. Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader() 2. ClassLoaderUtil的加载ClassLoader 3. SystemClassLoader
